our simpler and lighter ML models.from sentence: From , we can see that our simpler and lighter ML models either outperform or are comparable to the much heavier current state - of - the art on this dataset .

Audio - only results.from sentence:
Audio - only results :
Performance of LSTM and ARE reveals that deep models indeed need a lot of information to learn features as the LSTM classifier trained on eight - dimensional features achieves very low accuracy as compared to the end - to - end trained ARE .

Text - only results.from sentence:
Text - only results :
We observe that the performance of all the models for this setting is similar .

Audio + Text results.from sentence:
c) Audio + Text results :
We see that combining audio and text features gives us a boost of ? 14 % for all the metrics .

our simple ML methods.from sentence: Overall , we can conclude that our simple ML methods are very robust to have achieved comparable performance even though they are modeled to predict six - classes as opposed to four in previous works .
